outputs.duplicateipoutput = ""; outputs.duplicateshortdes=""; outputs.duplicatedes=""; outputs.task_sys=""; gaDupCheck.addEncodedQuery('last_discovered<=javascript:gs.endOfToday()');// gaDupCheck.addEncodedQuery('install_status=1') gaDupCheck.addEncodedQuery('sys_class_name=cmdb_ci_win_server') //gaDupCheck.addAggregate('COUNT','name'); //gaDupCheck.addAggregate('COUNT', 'serial_number'); gaDupCheck.addAggregate('COUNT', 'ip_address'); //gaDupCheck.addNotNullQuery('name'); gaDupCheck.addNotNullQuery('ip_address'); //gaDupCheck.addNotNullQuery('serial_number'); //gaDupCheck.groupBy('name'); // gaDupCheck.groupBy('serial_number'); gaDupCheck.groupBy('ip_address'); gaDupCheck.addHaving('COUNT','>',1); gaDupCheck.query(); while(gaDupCheck.next()) { var dupeRecordCount = gaDupCheck.getAggregate('COUNT', 'ip_address'); var dupeRecordsList = []; var dupeAggQuery = gaDupCheck.getAggregateEncodedQuery(); //var dedupeShortDesc = 'MRDS:Duplicate CIS Found ' + dupeRecordCount + ' records where ' + "ip_address" + ' = ' + gaDupCheck.getValue('ip_address') + '\n'; var dedupeDescription = ''; var dedupeDescription2=''; outputs.duplicateshortdes+=dedupeShortDesc+"\n"; // gs.log(dedupeShortDesc, 'Dedupe Task Script'); //Prepare notes - Header row dedupeDescription += 'NAME | CREATED ON | UPDATED ON | SYSID | CLASS' //GATHER ADDITIONAL DEVICE DETAILS (NEED SYS_IDs) var dupeDevices = new GlideRecord("cmdb_ci_server"); dupeDevices.addEncodedQuery(dupeAggQuery); //Use the exact query that the aggregate used for this group dupeDevices.query(); while (dupeDevices.next()) { var devName = dupeDevices.getValue('name'); var devCreated = dupeDevices.getDisplayValue('sys_created_on'); var devUpdated = dupeDevices.getDisplayValue('sys_updated_on'); var devId = dupeDevices.getUniqueValue(); var devClass = dupeDevices.getValue('sys_class_name'); //Add CI to notes dedupeDescription += '\n' + devName + ' | ' + devCreated + ' | ' + devUpdated + ' | ' + devId+ ' | ' + devClass; dedupeDescription2+= '\nName:' + devName + ' | Class:' + devClass; //Add sys_id to list of matched records for this group dupeRecordsList.push(devId); } outputs.duplicatedes+=dedupeDescription+"\n"; //gs.log(dedupeDescription, 'Dedupe Task Script'); //CREATE DEDUPLICATION TASK //Convert array to string - .createDuplicateTask() expects a comma separated string //var dedupeShortDesc = 'MRDS:Duplicate CIS Found ' + dupeRecordsList.length + ' records where ' + "ip_address" + ' = ' + gaDupCheck.getValue('ip_address') + '\n'; var deviceIdString = dupeRecordsList.join(); var dedupeUtil = new CMDBDuplicateTaskUtils(); var dedupeTaskId = dedupeUtil.createDuplicateTask(deviceIdString); var gr = new GlideRecord('duplicate_audit_result'); gr.addEncodedQuery('follow_on_task='+dedupeTaskId); gr.query(); var count = gr.getRowCount(); var dedupeShortDesc = 'MRDS:Duplicate CIS Found ' + count + ' records where ' + "ip_address" + ' = ' + gaDupCheck.getValue('ip_address') + '\n'; //UPDATE DEDUPLICATION TASK - ADD DETAILS if (dedupeTaskId) { var dedupeTask = new GlideRecord('reconcile_duplicate_task'); dedupeTask.get(dedupeTaskId); dedupeTask.setValue('short_description', dedupeShortDesc); dedupeTask.work_notes = dedupeDescription; dedupeTask.description = dedupeDescription2; var group=new GlideRecord('sys_user_group'); group.addEncodedQuery('nameSTARTSWITHConfiguration Mgmt-UIS');//Configuration Mgmt-UIS group.query(); //na.assignment_group=""; while(group.next()){ dedupeTask.assignment_group=group.sys_id; } dedupeTask.update(); outputs.task_sys+=dedupeTaskId+","; outputs.duplicateipoutput+='>>>Created de-duplication task ' + dedupeTask.getValue('number') + ' for ' + devName+"\n"; //gs.log('>>>Created de-duplication task ' + dedupeTask.getValue('number') + ' for ' + devName, 'Dedupe Task Script'); } } })(inputs,
